7-Day Delivery Process

From requirements to production-ready automation in 7 days. Daily updates, sandbox access by Day 3, complete handover with documentation.

Our 7-Day Process

A proven methodology that delivers production-ready automation systems

Day 1

Requirements & Design

Deep dive into your workflow, define success metrics, and design the automation architecture.

Workflow analysisTechnical specificationSuccess metrics defined
Day 2-3

Core Development

Build the AI agents, workflow orchestration, and system integrations.

Agent developmentWorkflow engine setupSystem integrations
Day 4-5

Testing & Refinement

Comprehensive testing with your real data and business rules.

End-to-end testingPerformance optimizationError handling
Day 6

Deployment & Training

Deploy to production and train your team on the new automation.

Production deploymentTeam trainingDocumentation
Day 7

Handover & Support

Complete handover with source code, documentation, and ongoing support setup.

Source code handoverComplete documentationSupport channel setup

Our Process Principles

How we ensure transparency, quality, and successful delivery

Daily Updates

You get a daily progress update with screenshots, demos, and next steps.

Sandbox Access

By Day 3, you have access to a working sandbox to test and provide feedback.

Real Data Testing

We test with your actual data and business rules, not dummy examples.

Production Ready

What we deliver is production-ready with monitoring, error handling, and security.

What You Get

Complete ownership and control of your automation system with everything needed for long-term success.

  • Complete source code ownership
  • Comprehensive documentation
  • Team training session
  • Production deployment
  • Monitoring & alerting setup
  • 30-90 day support (plan dependent)
  • Performance optimization
  • Security implementation

Common Questions

What if my requirements change during the 7 days?

Minor adjustments are included. Major scope changes may extend the timeline, but we'll discuss this upfront with transparent pricing.

Do you work with our existing systems?

Yes, we integrate with your existing tools and systems. We'll assess integration complexity during the requirements phase.

What happens after the 7 days?

You get complete ownership of the system plus ongoing support (30-90 days depending on your plan). Extended support is available.

Can we make changes after delivery?

Absolutely. You own the source code and can modify it yourself, or we can help with changes under our support plans.
